name: GodSpace Galactic Beta
description:
GodSpace is a sandbox space simulation game, in which the player can influence the physics of planets, stars, asteroids, comets, and even black holes. The player is free to spawn such objects, as well as control the flow of time itself.

But what is a God without life? Planets have limited metal resources, which they use to build ships, capable of mining asteroids or waging war with ships from other planets. The fate of this universe’s inhabitants is in your hands; will you save them from catastrophe, or push their home planet into the path of a black hole?

GodSpace Galactic 2 is currently in the works, you can vote for it on Steam Greenlight.
